data.title: Tank Destruction Badge Winners
data.meta_description: Tank Destruction Badge Winners - Free download as PDF File (.pdf), Text File (.txt) or read online for free. This document lists recipients of the German Tank Destruction Badge from World War 2. It provides the name, rank and unit for each recipient. The badge was awarded for destroying enemy tanks with hand-held explosives. It was established in 1942 and a higher class Gold badge was later introduced for those destroying 5 or more tanks. Over 500 recipients are listed with varying numbers of tanks destroyed noted for some.
